title: Mathew
description: Sorry to inform to all members that Mr. Mathew ( 79 ) (8C.1.12.4.1.1 ) Kavumkunnel house expired and funeral service will be held on 21.09.2022 between 3 & 4pm at Kottayam Simhasana Palli. Our heartfelt condolences and prayers to the family members. May God Bless his soul rest in peace.
address: Cheriyaveloor Branch Manarcad. Kavumkunnel house ( Puthenpurcakal )
